referenceObject.reference: Biswas, B. & Roy, R. (2008). Description of six new species of spiders of the genera Lathys (Family: Dictynidae), Marpissa (Family: Salticidae), Misumenoides (Family: Thomisidae), Agroeca (Family: Clubionidae), Gnaphosa (Family: Gnaphosidae) and Flanona (Family: Lycosidae)—from India. Records of the Zoological Survey of India 108(1): 43-57.
